content.text: Match ends, Everton 2, Brighton and Hove Albion 0.
Second Half ends, Everton 2, Brighton and Hove Albion 0.
Attempt missed. Jürgen Locadia (Brighton and Hove Albion) right footed shot from outside the box is too high following a set piece situation.
Jürgen Locadia (Brighton and Hove Albion) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton).
Foul by Pascal Groß (Brighton and Hove Albion).
Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Davy Pröpper (Brighton and Hove Albion) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Corner,  Brighton and Hove Albion. Conceded by Jordan Pickford.
Attempt saved. Pascal Groß (Brighton and Hove Albion) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Leonardo Ulloa.

Foul by Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton).
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Mat Ryan.
Penalty saved! Wayne Rooney (Everton) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.

Substitution, Brighton and Hove Albion. Leonardo Ulloa replaces Glenn Murray.
Goal!  Everton 2, Brighton and Hove Albion 0. Cenk Tosun (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Leighton Baines.
Attempt missed. Anthony Knockaert (Brighton and Hove Albion) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Pascal Groß.
